Hi there

I am Aryan pursuing Computer Science degree majoring in Cyber Security at MIT ADT University. I have a passion for all things related to technology and design, from software engineering to UI/UX. In addition to my love of technology and design, I am also interested in physics and outer space.

Below are details of some of projects I have developed over my journey till now.

Projects

AI legal Documentation

2023-24

  • Webdev
  • LLM
  • AI
  • Word-Prediction
  • NLP

Legal AI Documentation System was my mini-project in the 4th semester as a Computer Science student. I often find legal language difficult to understand, so I started working on a solution. I wanted to create a tool that could help me and others like me understand legal documents more easily. I used AI and Deep learning technology not only to understand the legal language but also to draft document.

Legal AI Documentation System is founded on the concept that the most effective way to assist legal professionals with documentation management is to automate and streamline the process, reducing the time and effort required for manual review and analysis. I achieved this by developing a cutting-edge AI engine that analyzes and processes legal documents with high accuracy, dramatically decreasing the need for manual review. This has the additional benefit of appealing to legal teams and professionals who want to manage their documentation more efficiently and focus on higher-value tasks.

Almost every aspect of the Legal AI Documentation System is custom-built, with the UI/UX and branding designed to provide a seamless user experience. The system is built using advanced technologies such as deep learning and natural language processing, and the AI engine is trained on a small dataset of legal documents as mini project but will look forward to enhance it in future.

nCreep

2024

  • 3d Modelling
  • Figma
  • UI/UX
  • Frontend Development

nCreeps is a leading provider of red teaming solutions, renowned for its proactive approach to cybersecurity. During my one-month internship at nCreeps, I had the privilege of working under the guidance of Team Leader Miss Aishani Juneja. My primary responsibility was to create 3D animations for the company's website.

FinBlock

2023

  • Seaborn
  • MatPlot Lib
  • Statastic

FinBlock is short form for Financial Block. This project is centralized to give companies a graphical representation of their sales and analyze the lowest selling component of their company. By which they can further enhance quality and resolve drawbacks of the product easily.
